scene_description_enriched: A bearded man, depicted as a pilgrim or traveler, carries a staff and wears a tunic and hose. He is accompanied by a younger figure, possibly a child or an angel, who is seated on his shoulders. This figure holds a cross and a globe, symbolizing Christ's dominion. The scene is framed by an arched architectural element, suggesting a sacred or symbolic space. The background is filled with a stippled pattern, possibly representing a divine or celestial realm. The overall composition evokes a sense of journey and divine guidance.
